-- | A never-empty list type.
--   
@package oneormore
@version 0.1.0.3

module Data.OneOrMore.Definition
data OneOrMore a
One :: a -> OneOrMore a
More :: a -> (OneOrMore a) -> OneOrMore a
instance Show a => Show (OneOrMore a)
instance Eq a => Eq (OneOrMore a)
instance Traversable OneOrMore
instance Applicative OneOrMore
instance Foldable OneOrMore
instance Functor OneOrMore
instance IsList (OneOrMore a)

module Data.OneOrMore.Operators
(++) :: OneOrMore a -> OneOrMore a -> OneOrMore a
length :: OneOrMore a -> Int
reverse :: OneOrMore a -> OneOrMore a
head :: OneOrMore a -> a
last :: OneOrMore a -> a
tail :: OneOrMore a -> OneOrMore a
init :: OneOrMore a -> OneOrMore a

module Data.OneOrMore
